messages.message:
Happy Holidays, Everyone! We are excited to announce a number of highly anticipated Build features coming to the AI Hub:rocket::rocket::rocket:. In *23.49*, we will GA
• *Clean and Quick Clean* 
    ◦ All users can now format extracted data using Quick Clean options or, for commercial users, using natural language prompts.
• *Validation Library View* 
    ◦ Commercial users can use this new validations aggregate view to compare the results of validation rules across documents. 
• *Enhanced Long Document Support*
    ◦ Confidence scores now supported for documents up to 20 pages in length. Verbose answers reduced.
• *More Intuitive UX to Add Classes* 
See the Build Release Notes (https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/docs/aihub-preview/releasenotes/index.html#build) for more details. In addition, we also have the following features available for Internal Preview (GA planned in 24.02). See docs (https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/docs/aihub-preview/releasenotes/preview/) for more details and current limitations. We can’t wait to hear your feedback!
• *Refinement via UDF*
• *Validation via UDF*
• *Split Classification*
